title: Cat Mayor: Food Budget!

panels.scene_description: A bustling town square. Banners proclaim: 'Elect Whiskers for Mayor!' A cat, Whiskers, stands on a podium, wearing a tiny suit. People (and some dogs) look on, bemused.
panels.dialogue: Whiskers (meowing into a microphone): Meow! (I promise to increase the cat food budget tenfold!)
panels.narrative_function: Introduces the protagonist and the initial situation: a cat running for mayor on a single-issue platform.
panels.english_prompt: cartoon style, 4-panel comic, clear characters, panel 1: Town square, cat mayor candidate (Whiskers) on podium, banners reading 'Elect Whiskers', crowd of people and dogs looking on.

panels.scene_description: A town hall meeting. Citizens are raising their hands in protest. Whiskers sits calmly at the mayor's desk, grooming itself. A sign on the desk reads: 'Mayor Whiskers'.
panels.dialogue:
Angry Citizen 1: But what about the schools? The roads? 
Angry Citizen 2: All the budget for cat food?!
panels.narrative_function: Develops the conflict: citizens protesting the cat's one-track agenda.
panels.english_prompt: cartoon style, 4-panel comic, clear characters, panel 2: Town hall meeting, angry citizens raising hands, cat (Mayor Whiskers) at desk grooming, sign 'Mayor Whiskers'.

panels.scene_description: A close-up of Whiskers' face. A sly grin spreads across its face. An thought bubble above its head shows a pile of tuna cans.
panels.dialogue: Whiskers (thinking): Heh heh hehâ€¦ They have no idea about the tuna.
panels.narrative_function: Introduces a twist: the cat's true, selfish motives.
panels.english_prompt: cartoon style, 4-panel comic, clear characters, panel 3: Close-up of cat (Mayor Whiskers) with sly grin, thought bubble showing pile of tuna cans.

panels.scene_description: The town square again, now overflowing with cats feasting on giant piles of cat food and tuna. The human citizens look on in dismay.
panels.dialogue:
Citizen 1: I voted for lower taxes! 
Citizen 2: Our town is a giant litter box now!
panels.narrative_function: Provides a humorous and satirical conclusion: the cat's policies lead to absurd results.
panels.english_prompt: cartoon style, 4-panel comic, clear characters, panel 4: Town square overflowing with cats eating cat food and tuna, dismayed human citizens looking on.

overall_style: Humorous and satirical, for adult readers.
